>
> I'm tryi=
ng to test an eclipse plugin with JUnit from within eclipse. 
> We I try to=
 run the test, the plugin I'm testing spits out, invalid
> command line inp=
ut, "-version".
> 
> But, I can't seem to find this command line argument a=
nywhere.  It's
> not in the run configuration for the test or for the plugi=
n.  Where is

You can do the=
 following trick. Run with debugger, click on the
execution thread (see the=
 properties) and you will see the command
line that was used to run.
